Description: Grey granite seated statue of Amenemhat; Hieroglyphic text on the block-seat.
Curator's comments: See PM viii, p. 377. Published: HTBM Part 5: Plate 5 Götter, Gräber und die Kunst, 125 (no. 91) W. Seipel, Ägypten Vol. 1, Linz 1989, p.125 [91].
Bibliographic references: Hall 1914 / Hieroglyphic texts from Egyptian stelae, etc., in the British Museum, Part 5. (pl.5)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1990 20 Oct-9 Dec, Japan, Tokyo, Setagaya Art Museum, Treasures of the British Museum, cat. no.46 1991 5 Jan-20 Feb, Japan, Yamaguchi, Prefectural Museum of Art, Treasures of the British Museum, cat. no.46 1991 9 Mar-7 May, Japan, Osaka, National Museum of Art, Treasures of the British Museum, cat. no.46
